segments.text: I notice the woman standing there, so absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate meticulously, towel bunched up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water's cascading over the sink edge, forming a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it, and she might slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretches high on that tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so unstable, ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting eagerly, palm open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked nearby, could shatter if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene, bushes lining the path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see this potential mess unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to the dangers?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens to them.
segments.speaker: PAR
